## ValueCodec type

Utility to convert a value type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValueCodec<Encoded, Decoded> = {
    decode: (value: Encoded) => Decoded;
    encode: (value: Decoded) => Encoded;
};
```
